title: MONDAY 5/3 -QB QUESTIONS
itunes:title: MONDAY 5/3 -QB QUESTIONS
description:
The Bears landing Justin Fields in the 2021 NFL Draft, but will he be the starter come week 1? Head Coach Matt Nagy (0:21) addresses the Bears QB situation. The Buccaneers picking up Florida QB Kyle Trask (1:20), but did Bruce Arians consult Tom Brady before making the pick? The Texans await the fate of Deshaun Watson, but drafted Davis Mills, which led some to believe Watson's time in Houston could be coming to an end (2:00)...and Packers head coach Matt LaFleur (2:41) discusses the future of Aaron Rodgers in Green Bay

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
